item.title: ‘We are acquaintances, not friends’: My neighbors need somewhere to stay after a house fire. Do I say yes?
item.description: “We feel obliged to offer our house to this couple to live in while they deal with this horrible experience.”

item.title: What Powell needs to do to fend off Trump and keep the Fed independent — for now
item.description: The Trump administration’s attacks on the Fed highlight the problems with Fed discretion and obscurity.

item.title: Alphabet’s latest deal reveals the hottest area of AI right now
item.description: As the AI talent wars escalate, Google’s new arrangement with startup Windsurf shows tech companies see a lot of value in coding assistants.

item.title: MicroStrategy’s stock surges as bitcoin buys resume, lifting holdings to above 600,000
item.description: MicroStrategy is buying bitcoin again after taking a one-week break. It now owns more than 600,000 bitcoin, valued at more than $73 billion.
